thread.title: 120 jobs at risk as Caparo steel goes into partial administration
thread.title_full: 120 jobs at risk as Caparo steel goes into partial administration - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: 120 jobs at risk as Caparo steel goes into partial administration
text: A steel firm has gone into partial administration putting nearly 120 jobs in Wales at risk, it has been confirmed. Administrators Price Waterhouse Coopers (PwC) said they have been appointed to run some parts of Carparo group empire. The company employs 92 employees in Wrexham and 24 workers in Tredegar. Matt Hammond, PwC lead administrator and partner, said: " We will be rapidly assessing all options for the businesses. " Share this story About sharing
